original_text: I know that you are already taking me to my death. Everyone who lives has to go to that place. I know that you are already taking me to my death. Everyone who lives has to go to that place. I know that you are already taking me to my death.
korean_text: 내가 아나이다 주께서 나를 죽게 하사 모든 생물을 위하여 정한 집으로 돌려보내시리이다

sentences.original_text: I know that you are already taking me to my death
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신이 이미 나를 죽음으로 데려가고 있다는 것을 알고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Everyone who lives has to go to that place
sentences.korean_translation: 살아있는 모든 사람은 그곳으로 가야 합니다

sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신이 이미 나를 죽음으로 데려가고 있다는 것을 알고 있습니다
